channel.title: pycon2006 on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in pycon2006 on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: PyCon paper, slides online
item.description: My slides and paper from PyCon 2006 are now online.

item.title: PyCon Day 1
item.description: Friday was the first full day of talks at PyCon.

item.title: PyCon Day 2: The Middle Child
item.description: The second day of PyCon started with Guido’s annual State of Python keynote, during which he described some new developments in the Python universe, and things that will be going into Python 2.

item.title: PyCon Day 3: Winding Down
item.description: Sunday, the third day of PyCon 2006, definitely felt like the day of rest.

item.title: Zope Sprint Reflections
item.description: So I’m more than a little behind on my PyCon wrap up posts, so I’ll start at the end, with the Zope Sprint.

item.title: The More Things Change, the More They Stay The Same (PyCon 2006)
item.description: I arrived in [STRIKEOUT:Dallas]Addison, TX Thursday night for PyCon 2006 .

item.title: PyCon 2006
item.description: So registration is open for PyCon 2006, taking place in lovely greater Dallas late February, 2006.
